TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceAccount extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定服务的安全上下文，安全上下文定义其登录类型。

span.span: Specifies a service's security context, which defines its logon type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用枚举初始化时来指定要安装的服务的安全上下文。Use the enumeration when you initialize a to specify the security context of the service you are installing. 安全上下文指示服务对系统和服务 （例如，是否在服务计算机的凭据或匿名凭据提供给远程服务器） 在网络上的执行操作的特权。The security context indicates the privileges a service has on the system and how the services act on the network (for example, whether the service presents the computer's credentials or anonymous credentials to remote servers). 枚举提供了一系列特权，以便你可以指定完全任何特定的服务所需的特权。The enumeration provides a range of privileges so that you can specify exactly the privileges you need for any particular service. `LocalSystem`值定义一个高特权的帐户，但大多数服务不需要这样的提升的特权级别。The `LocalSystem` value defines a highly privileged account, but most services do not require such an elevated privilege level. `LocalService`和`NetworkService`枚举成员提供较低的特权级别的安全上下文。The `LocalService` and `NetworkService` enumeration members provide a lower privilege level for the security context. > [!NOTE] > 值`LocalService`和`NetworkService`仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上可用。The values `LocalService` and `NetworkService` are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 family. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举，以通过使用系统帐户的安全上下文中安装新程序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to install new programs by using the system account's security context. summary.span: 充当本地计算机上非特权用户的帐户，该帐户将匿名凭据提供给所有远程服务器。

span.span: An account that acts as a non-privileged user on the local computer, and presents anonymous credentials to any remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount LocalSystem = int32(2)

span.span: An account, used by the service control manager, that has extensive privileges on the local computer and acts as the computer on the network.

span.span: An account that provides extensive local privileges, and presents the computer's credentials to any remote server.
